graph.description:
The Bio-Informatics Roll
This roll contains utilities like the NCBI Blast, hmmer, BioPython, BioPerl, etc that provide BioInformatics tools and development libraries.
graph.changelog:
$Log: bio.xml,v $ Revision 1.8 2009/06/04 22:54:48 anoop Upgraded Bioperl and it's dependencies
Revision 1.7 2008/12/23 00:28:50 mjk added bio cond attr
Revision 1.6 2006/07/13 18:02:50 anoop Cleaned up the code a bit. Build requirements have their own xml file ReportLab changed to reportlab to avoid naming conflicts reportlab is now added as a build requirement for biopython
Revision 1.5 2006/03/14 02:50:50 mjk fix XML syntax error
Revision 1.4 2006/03/09 22:06:04 anoop *** empty log message ***
Revision 1.3 2005/12/20 21:07:34 anoop *** empty log message ***
Revision 1.2 2005/12/14 03:11:04 mjk added cvs tags back, roll builds
